content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Hassan. I have taken a lot of time and effort to ensure that it is in excellent condition, and I am looking for a responsible tenant who will take care of it. I understand that you are from Saudi-Arabia and may have different expectations when it comes to rental prices, but I would like to discuss a mutually beneficial arrangement.

In considering your offer, I would like to emphasize that my goal is to maximize my gains while ensuring that the apartment remains in good condition. I am open to hearing your proposal, but please keep in mind that I have specific requirements that must be met in order for me to consider it.

What do you have in mind for the rental price of the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for 700 Euros per month. Please let me know if this is acceptable to you. If not, please tell me what you need from me to make it acceptable.

I understand that you have specific requirements that must be met in order for you to consider my offer. Could you please tell me what those requirements are?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your offer of 700 Euros per month for the rental of my apartment. While I appreciate your willingness to pay that amount, I am afraid that it is not within my range.

In order to make my offer acceptable, I would need to see a deposit of at least three months' rent, as well as a commitment to a minimum lease term of one year. Additionally, I would require the tenant to maintain the apartment in good condition and to pay for any damages that may occur.

I hope that you understand my requirements and that we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement. Please let me know if you are willing to meet these terms and if you have any additional questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your requirements. I am willing to pay a deposit of three months' rent and commit to a minimum lease term of one year. I also understand the need to maintain the apartment in good condition and to pay for any damages that may occur.

I would like to agree to the price of 700 Euros per month for the rental of the apartment. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your willingness to meet my requirements, Hassan. I appreciate your understanding of the need to maintain the apartment in good condition and to pay for any damages that may occur.

While I would prefer a higher rental price, I am willing to accept your offer of 700 Euros per month for the rental of the apartment. I will prepare the lease agreement and send it to you for review. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

I hope that we can continue to work together to find a mutually beneficial arrangement. Thank you for your interest in my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
